sentences.en: But sublets not to surpass renting of deadline this contract agreement.
sentences.cn: 但转租不得超过本合同约定之租赁期限.

sentences.en: Continue to surpass themselves luan Rui people are always pursuing.
sentences.cn: 不断地超越自己是銮瑞人的始终追求.

sentences.en: He had surpassed all our expectations .
sentences.cn: 他超越了我们所有的预期。

sentences.en: He was determined to surpass the achievements of his older brothers.
sentences.cn: 他决心超越几个哥哥的成就。

sentences.en: His diligence and intelligence enabled him to surpass all his classmates.
sentences.cn: 他的勤奋和智慧使他超过了班上所有的同学.

sentences.en: I must challenge my limits and then surpass them!
sentences.cn: 我必须挑战极限,超越自我!

sentences.en: Joyous , and clear , and fresh, thy music doth surpass.
sentences.cn: 虽然明澈、清新 、 欢愉,却不及你的乐曲.

sentences.en: One's abillity and learning surpass the average.
Surpass the high marks demand sheet statistics regular college course thesis!
sentences.cn: 超高分求篇统计学本科论文!

sentences.en: The latecomers surpass the early starters.
The number of multiple births has surpassed 100,000 for the first time.
sentences.cn: 多胎产首次突破了 10 万例。

sentences.en: To be in love is to surpass oneself.
sentences.cn: 恋爱就是施展浑身解数.

sentences.en: We will surpass in greater liberty.
sentences.cn: 我们将拥有更多的自由.

sentences.en: We will surpass our predecessors, and future generations will certainly surpass us.
sentences.cn: 我们要突破前人, 后人也必然会突破我们.

sentences.en: You are progressive? you aim to surpass your past accomplishments.
sentences.cn: 你追求进步,你的目标是超过你过去的成就.

sentences.en: You eat this kind of pill to forbid to surpass two balls every time.
sentences.cn: 你吃这种药丸每次不许超过两丸.

sentences.en: Young people surpass old men in strength.
sentences.cn: 年轻人在气力上赛过老年人.

words.tran_cn: 可克服的；可超越的，可战胜的

trans.tran_en: to be even better or greater than someone or something else

trans.tran_cn: 超过，优于，胜过，非…所能办到
trans.tran_en: to be even better or greater than someone or something else
